verbs.description: [ARG0: investors] [V: continue] [ARG1: buying bonds as the most hated bull market in stocks] is still a thing investors are shoveling money into bonds at a furious pace despite having virtually every conceivable reason to ditch the sector april in fact saw the most money devoted to fixed income since october 2014 coming despite tumult over a multi - year peak in several government bond yields that fueled worry over a broader turn in market conditions and higher inflation american association of individual investors morningstar trump datatrek research steve laipply nick colas escape the fate blackrock federal reserve system
